title: Node.js in Action, Second Edition
authors: Bradley Meck Alex Young and Mike Cantelon
description: "Node.js in Action, Second Edition" is a thoroughly revised book based on the best-selling first edition. It starts at square one and guides you through all the features, techniques, and concepts you'll need to build production-quality Node applications. You'll master key design concepts such as asynchronous programming, state management, and event-driven programming. And you'll learn to put together MVC servers using Express and Connect, design web APIs, and set up the perfect production environment to build, lint, and test.
